scripts.build: cd react-app && npm install && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.android: cordova platform rm android && cordova platform add android && cordova build android
scripts.ios: cordova platform rm ios && cordova platform add ios && cordova build ios
scripts.build-android: npm run build && cordova build android
scripts.release-android: npm run build && cordova build android --release
scripts.build-ios: npm run build && cordova build ios
